title: Uncle Si Was Pranked Hard on His Birthday & LOVED It!
description:
Si turns 15 — make that 74 — and can't stop laughing at the elaborate birthday prank Phillip and the Robertsons once played on him. John-David is shocked by what Si wasn't allowed to say on "Fox & Friends." Si loved seeing Willie get roasted at his 50th birthday party. Martin learns what a squirrel sheriff is. And the boys have a whole lot of wisdom for people who struggle with faith in what they can't see.
-
